00047         static void _tp_readbuffer(oggpack_buffer *opb, char *buf, const long len)
00048         {
00049                 long i;
00050 
00051                 for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00052                         *buf++=oggpack_read(opb,8);
00053         }
00054 
00062         static void _tp_writebuffer(oggpack_buffer *opb, const char *buf, const long len)
00063         {
00064                 long i;
00065 
00066                 for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00067                         oggpack_write(opb, *buf++, 8);
00068         }

00074         static int irct_encode_init()
00075         {
00076                 return 0;
00077         };
00078 
00083         static int irct_encode_clear()
00084         {
00085                 return 0;
00086         };

00093         static int irct_encode_headerout(ogg_packet *op)
00094         {
00095                 oggpack_buffer ob;
00096                 oggpack_writeinit(&ob);
00097                 oggpack_write(&ob, 0, 8);               //header init
00098                 _tp_writebuffer(&ob, "irct", 32);
00099                 oggpack_write(&ob, 0, 8);               //version 0
00100                 oggpack_write(&ob, 1, 8);               //subversion 1
00101                 int bytes=oggpack_bytes(&ob);
00102                 op->packet= (unsigned char*) kvi_malloc(bytes);
00103                 memcpy(op->packet, oggpack_get_buffer(&ob), bytes);
00104                 op->bytes=bytes;
00105                 oggpack_writeclear(&ob);
00106                 op->b_o_s=1;                            //begins a logical bitstream
00107                 op->e_o_s=0;
00108                 op->packetno=0;
00109                 op->granulepos=0;
00110 
00111                 return 0;
00112         }
00113 
00122         static int irct_encode_packetout(const char* textPkt, int textSize, int last_p, ogg_packet *op)
00123         {
00124                 if(!textSize)return(0);
00125 
00126                 oggpack_buffer ob;
00127                 oggpack_writeinit(&ob);
00128 
00129                 _tp_writebuffer(&ob, textPkt, textSize); //pre-encoded text
00130                 int bytes=oggpack_bytes(&ob);
00131                 op->packet= (unsigned char *)kvi_malloc(bytes);
00132                 memcpy(op->packet, oggpack_get_buffer(&ob), bytes);
00133                 op->bytes=bytes;
00134                 oggpack_writeclear(&ob);
00135                 op->b_o_s=0;
00136                 op->e_o_s=last_p;
00137 
00138                 op->packetno=last_p;
00139                 op->granulepos=0;
00140 
00141                 return 0;
00142         }
00143 
00149         static int irct_decode_headerin(ogg_packet *op)
00150         {
00151                 oggpack_buffer ob;
00152                 oggpack_readinit(&ob, op->packet, op->bytes);
00153                 quint8 ret, version, subversion;
00154                 ret = oggpack_read(&ob,8);
00155                 if(ret!=0) return 1;
00156                 char * buf = (char*) kvi_malloc(4);
00157                 _tp_readbuffer(&ob, buf, 4);
00158                 if(strncmp(buf, "irct", 4)!=0) return 1;
00159                 version = oggpack_read(&ob,8);
00160                 subversion = oggpack_read(&ob,8);
00161                 return 0;
00162         }
00163 
00171         static int irct_decode_packetin(char** textPkt, int *textSize, ogg_packet *op)
00172         {
00173                 oggpack_buffer ob;
00174                 oggpack_readinit(&ob, op->packet, op->bytes);
00175                 *textSize = op->bytes;
00176                 *textPkt=(char*)kvi_malloc(*textSize);
00177                 _tp_readbuffer(&ob, *textPkt, *textSize);
00178                 return 0;
00179         }
